---
id: update-player
title: "UpdatePlayer"
description: "Call this API to update the playback progress, audio transcoding parameters, video transcoding parameters, and other information of the specified cloud player."
api: 
info_path: extended_services/cloud_player/en/server/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>UpdatePlayer</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Call this API to update the playback progress, audio transcoding parameters, video transcoding parameters, and other information of the specified cloud player.

<Note title="Note">Call frequency limit: 20 times/second</Note>

## Request
<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Action","in":"query","description":"> API prototype parameter\n>\n> https://cloud-player-api.zego.im?Action=UpdatePlayer\n","required":true,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["UpdatePlayer"]},"style":"form","explode":true}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"AppId","in":"query","description":"ðŸ’¡Common parameter. Application Id, a unique user credential assigned by ZEGOCLOUD. Can be obtained from <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://console.zegocloud.com/\">ZEGOCLOUD Console</a>.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"number","format":"uint32"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"SignatureNonce","in":"query","description":"ðŸ’¡Common parameter. 16-digit hexadecimal random string (hex encoding of 8-byte random number). Signature version number.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"2.0","enum":["2.0"]}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Signature","in":"query","description":"ðŸ’¡Common parameter. <MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime request"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><ul className={"request-schema-first-body-node-container"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"PlayerId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Cloud player unique identifier ID, returned by [CreatePlayer](/cloud-player-server/create-player).\n<b>When calling this API, please ensure that the PlayerId exists, otherwise an error may occur.</b>\n","example":"player_1"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Sequence"} required={true} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Request sequence number, used to ensure timing. Parameter modifications for the same player task need to ensure the sequence number is incremented. For example, \"Sequence\": 1. The ZEGOCLOUD server will update the cloud player according to the latest configuration.\n","example":100}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"StreamUrl"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 1024 characters`"} schema={{"type":"string","maxLength":1024,"description":"Address of the media resource, must be a valid HTTP/HTTPS address with a length within 1024 bytes.\n> **Warning**\n>\n> This needs to be selected based on whether a single player or a list player was created when [creating a cloud player](/cloud-player-server/create-player).\n>\n> - When creating a single player, the `StreamUrl` parameter is optional, `StreamUrlList` is not optional;\n> - When creating a list player, the `StreamUrlList` parameter is optional, `StreamUrl` is not optional.\n>\n> <b>If `StreamUrl` or `StreamUrlList` is filled in here, other parameters will be ignored.</b>\n","example":"https://xxx.com/video/test111.mp4"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"StreamUrlList"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Media resource list address. Updating the list will reset the media resource list and immediately start playing from the first resource in the new list.\n> **Warning**\n>\n> This needs to be selected based on whether a single player or a list player was created when [creating a cloud player](/cloud-player-server/create-player).\n>\n> - When creating a single player, the `StreamUrl` parameter is optional, `StreamUrlList` is not optional;\n> - When creating a list player, the `StreamUrlList` parameter is optional, `StreamUrl` is not optional.\n>\n> <b>If `StreamUrl` or `StreamUrlList` is filled in here, other parameters will be ignored.</b>\n","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["https://xxx.com/video/test1.mp4","https://xxx.com/video/test2.mp4"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"BackupStreamUrl"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 1024 characters`"} schema={{"type":"string","maxLength":1024,"description":"Backup address of the media resource, must be a valid HTTP/HTTPS address with a length within 1024 bytes. When the address in the StreamUrl parameter fails to access, the cloud player will attempt to access the backup address.","example":""}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>VideoOptions</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>Video transcoding parameter configuration.<b>Please note that when this parameter is not filled in, the configuration from the last call to this API or when the cloud player was created will be used by default.</b></div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Width"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 1` and `<= 3000`"} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Video width, value range is [1, 3000], and must be an even multiple of 2, unit is px.\n<b>Please note that when either Width or Height parameter is set to 1, it means audio-only stream publishing; when this parameter is not filled in, the configuration from the last call to this API or when the cloud player was created will be used by default.</b>\n","minimum":1,"maximum":3000,"example":360}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Height"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 1` and `<= 3000`"} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Video height, value range is [1, 3000], and must be an even multiple of 2, unit is px.\n<b>Please note that when either Width or Height parameter is set to 1, it means audio-only stream publishing; when this parameter is not filled in, the configuration from the last call to this API or when the cloud player was created will be used by default.</b>\n","minimum":1,"maximum":3000,"example":640}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"VideoBitrate"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 1` and `<= 50000`"} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Video bitrate, value range is [1, 50000], unit is kbps.\n<b>Please note that when this parameter is not filled in, the configuration from the last call to this API or when the cloud player was created will be used by default.</b>\n","minimum":1,"maximum":50000,"example":1200}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} when the cloud player was created will be used by default.</b>\n","minimum":1,"maximum":192,"example":48}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Volume"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 0` and `<= 200`"} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Volume value, range is [0, 200].\n<b>Please note that when this parameter is not filled in, the configuration from the last call to this API or when the cloud player was created will be used by default.</b>\n","minimum":0,"maximum":200,"example":150}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"SeekTo"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Specify playback progress (seconds).\n<b>Please note that when this parameter is not filled in, the configuration from the last call to this API or when the cloud player was created will be used by default.</b>\n","example":10}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"IsPause"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`0`, `1`]"} schema={{"type":"number","enum":[0,1],"description":"Whether to pause playback.\n- 0: Play source file normally.\n- 1: Pause playing source file.\n> **Warning**\n>\n> When setting pause playback, the StreamUrl parameter cannot be passed, otherwise other parameter configurations will be ignored, causing pause playback to fail.\n","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"RepeatTimes"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Number of playbacks.\n- 1: Play media stream 1 time.\n- -1: Automatically loop playback.\n- n: Custom number of media stream playbacks, must be greater than 0.\n\n<b>Please note that when this parameter is not filled in or the value is 0, the configuration from the last call to this API or when the cloud player was created will be used by default.</b>\n","example":1}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
